message.body: ######### How are you? I'm on my way back to Philly. Beautiful week with with my family in Asheville. I have a question for you regarding a dog sit. I'm scheduled for a Biggie Sit July 4-13 and was wondering if you were free to do three of those nights: Sun, July 6th thru Wed, July 9th. I could do the sleepover on the 4th and 5th and then continue the sit on Wed night, July 9th. Still sorting out my plans, but wanted to see if you were available. Let me know. Thanks!

Hey, I'm glad to hear everything went well on your trip. I won't be available those nights because my girlfriend will be visiting for my birthday. Sorry I can't help out with this sit. Hope u are doing well.
Girlfriend!?!! Oh, nice! Where's she visiting from? My plans were loose anyway for those dates, so don't worry about it. I'm sure there will be plenty more dog sits this summer.

Yeah, she lives in ####### I also just started back working at the ############### so I am busy again with that. Sorry I couldn't help out this time but thanks for keeping me in mind! Hopefully we can meet up soon and get a ######
I figured she must live in ########You've been heading up there a lot lately. Good for you! Yes, regarding a drink. Soon!!!
Thanks, she's an old friend from penn. If ur working this weekend maybe I'll see you when I'm at the gallery
Working a double tomorrow. Was supposed to work brunch today, but flight from Asheville was cancelled last night. On my way back now.
Ugg... Sorry to hear that. Safe travels.
